MemberSignature.Value: public Uri RootCategoryUri { get; }
.property instance class System.Uri RootCategoryUri
Public ReadOnly Property RootCategoryUri As Uri
public: property Uri ^ RootCategoryUri { Uri ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the Root Category URI. The Root Category is the single category which has no parent category, and from which all other chat rooms and chat room categories are inherited. Use this category as a starting point to explore the entire hierarchy of chat rooms and chat room categories.
